metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • In a bowl, combine the mashed chickpeas, spinach, carrots, tahini, and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper. • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the mixture evenly. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half. Turkey and Apple Sandwich
• In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper. • Season with salt and pepper. • Serve immediately. Almond Butter and Apple Slices

• In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. • Add zucchini noodles and cook until tender. • Stir in basil pesto and cherry tomatoes. • Season with salt and pepper. • Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese and serve. Beef and Broccoli

• In a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned. • Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until softened. • Stir in taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened. • Serve beef mixture in taco shells or tortillas with desired toppings.

• 2 pounds pork ribs • 1/4 cup honey • 1/4 cup soy sauce • 2 tablespoons rice vinegar • 3 cloves garlic, minced • 1 teaspoon grated ginger • 1 teaspoon paprika • Salt and pepper to taste • Sliced green onions for garnish
o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter. o Serve with breadsticks.
o Slice cucumbers thinly. o Mix minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, gochugaru, and sesame seeds in a bowl. o Toss cucumbers with the dressing. o Serve chilled.
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion. o Mix vegetables with olives and crumbled feta cheese. o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, and salt, then pour over salad. o Toss well and serve.

o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion. o Blanch green beans until tender. o Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, onion, green beans, olives, and tuna on a plate. o Quarter hard-boiled eggs and add to the salad. o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and salt, then drizzle over the salad. o Toss gently and serve.
